alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Walton County through 345 PM CDT... At 313 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of De Funiak Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Fox Hill, Sand Hill, Alpine Heights, New Harmony and Mossy Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
